meta.content: "The mission of the Westhope Public School is to foster kindness, responsibility and integrity in each student and provide the educational opportunities to create productive citizens in our society."

font.em: "The mission of the Westhope Public School is to foster kindness, responsibility and integrity in each student and provide the educational opportunities to create productive citizens in our society."

u.font:
WESTHOPE PUBLIC SCHOOL COVID-19 and
DISTANCE EDUCATION WEBPAGE HAS BEEN ADDED TO OUR WEBSITE FOR PARENT, STUDENT, and COMMUNITY INFORMATION
PLEASE CLICK ON THE BANNER ABOVE.

br.br: Westhope Public School will be moving our School Board meetings to a virtual platform in response to the Coivid-19 health situation. All open meeting laws will still apply. Attached below are links to joining us for our virtual meetings:

strong.u:
Here is the link for easy access to our virtual School Board meetings. All you have to do is click “Join Meeting”. If all else fails, use the dial in number!
Special School Board meeting with State School Board Members Wednesday April 29th at 6 pm.
